alert.note: Alert for Brown; Shawano; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Brown, southern Oconto and east central Shawano Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 544 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Gillett to near Shawano. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shawano, Pulaski, Keshena, Legend Lake, Little Suamico, Chase, Oconto Falls, Abrams, Angelica and Stiles. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
